text: Kousuke Atari (, Atari Kōsuke; born July 13, 1980 in Amami island, Kagoshima) is a Japanese singer and Shimauta utasha. == Albums == Release Title Chart 2006 なつかしゃのシマ (Natsukasha no Shima) - Mini album 65 2006 2006 2006 触動心弦 (Chung Dong Xin Xian) - Asian limited edition 1 2007 ユライ花 (Yurai Bana) - 1st studio album 7 2007 2007 花間道 (Hua Jian Dao) - "Yurai Bana" Asian edition 5 == Other websites == * * Sony Music Online Japan Artist * Kousuke Atari at EPIC-JP.net Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese singers Category:People from Kagoshima Prefecture
title: Kousuke Atari
